name: Dungeon and Diapers
description:
Reset your view if you can't reach the button.

Will get the screenshots and video uploaded tomorrow after work.

How to play (Please read, no in game tutorial)

The goal is to change as many diapers as you can. If a skeleton baby pooped in a dirty diaper you lose one life, so make sure all the diapers are clean.

Grab and move the stick on the left to move the grabber around. Press the button on the right to activate the grabber. Similar to the claw machine in the arcades.

  • If the grabber grabbed a skeleton baby, it will throw it to you.
  • You can throw the skeleton baby back into the crib by pressing the button again. (If the diaper is on)

To take off the dirty diaper, grab the three orange sphere away. 

To put on a clean diaper, grab the three orange sphere to the middle.

This is a submission to the VR Jam 2022. Due to time constraint it is not polished. Main menu is missing, game restart after life reaches zero, no BGM, some bug here and there, but I still hope you're having fun with this game.
